casebody.data:
Lawrence Ronald VALENTINE, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Michael Villani, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Attorney General; Jessica E. Perlick, Deputy Attorney General; and Isidro Baca, Warden, NNCC, Real Parties in Interest. No. 78287 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MARCH 28, 2019

DENIED.
